featured.text: Each nest used to have but one queen, but now many mounds are often found with multiple queens.
With multiple queens at work, its population increases rapidly.
Each nest of the red ant has one queen.

definition.zh_def: 女王；女性統治者或王國的最高統治者。
definition.en_def: A female monarch or the highest ruler of a kingdom.
definition.example: The queen attended the charity event to support local organizations.
